The user waves their [[sword]] back and forth, which when seen by the target locks them in a genjutsu which causes them to hallucinate multiple waving arms out to slash them. The movement resembles that of a [[wikipedia:willow|willow tree]] blowing in the wind. With the enemy off guard, the user is free to cut them down.
